author: konmagat
title: Konmaswap a DEX for Cardano
description: There lacks a platform where new users can come onboard Cardano by having an easy way of utilizing various integrated DeFi solutions and ICO
solution: KonmaSwap will provide an easy way to deploy smart contracts on the cardano chain and utilize Sales tools for an easy ICO process and more
experience: Konma Labz has taken part in hackathons conducted by various Protocols & Projects. Also helped integrate blockchain for over 15 sectors.
